Description:
Tbot Techno Systems, a leading IT Solutions and Services company, is seeking a Regional Sales Manager to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for driving sales growth by developing relationships with potential clients, identifying new business opportunities, and collaborating with existing customers to ensure customer satisfaction. You will also work closely with our diverse team of IT professionals to provide customized IT solutions to our clients. As a trusted partner to leading IT Original Equipment Manufacturers, Tbot Techno Systems takes pride in offering comprehensive and seamless IT solutions across all platforms. We are committed to delivering unparalleled custom IT solutions and providing our clients with world-class support.Drive sales growth by developing relationships with potential clients within the assigned region.
Identify new business opportunities and collaborate with existing customers to ensure customer satisfaction.
Develop annual business plans for your assigned region that align with the company's strategic objectives.
Collaborate with our sales and marketing teams to develop and implement effective sales strategies.
Maintain accurate records of customer interactions and transactions.
Stay up to date with the latest industry trends and product offerings.
